tool_description:
A reliable API to search LinkedIn jobs and scrape job post data. %100 live data, no dead data!

**For any questions or requests, please feel free to leave a message in the Discussions or PM channels.**

**Please contact us if you need a custom package**
name: Rapid Linkedin Jobs API
title: Rapid Linkedin Jobs API

api_list.name: Get Job Details
api_list.description: The endpoint returns all detail of the job and company

api_list.name: Search Jobs
api_list.description: Search LinkedIn jobs with keywords, company, location, on-site/remote, date posted, title, function, industry, salary, experience level, and job type filters.

optional_parameters.name: salary
optional_parameters.description:
it could be one of these; 40k+, 60k+, 80k+, 100k+, 120k+, 140k+, 160k+, 180k+, 200k+
Example: 80k+

optional_parameters.name: functionIds
optional_parameters.description: please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/rapid-linkedin-jobs-api/tutorials/how-to-find-a-function-id-on-linkedin%3F) to find function id

optional_parameters.name: industryIds
optional_parameters.description: please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/rapid-linkedin-jobs-api/tutorials/how-to-find-a-industry-id-on-linkedin%3F) to find industry id

optional_parameters.name: companyIds
optional_parameters.description: please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/rapid-linkedin-jobs-api/tutorials/how-to-find-a-company-id-on-linkedin%3F-1) to find company id

optional_parameters.name: jobType
optional_parameters.description:
it could be one of these; fullTime, partTime, contract, internship
Example: contract

optional_parameters.name: locationId
optional_parameters.description: please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/rapid-linkedin-jobs-api/tutorials/how-to-find-a-location-id-on-linkedin%3F) to find location id

optional_parameters.name: start
optional_parameters.description: it could be one of these; 0, 25, 50, 75, 100, etc.

optional_parameters.name: experienceLevel
optional_parameters.description:
it could be one of these; internship, associate, director, entryLevel, midSeniorLevel. executive
example: executive

optional_parameters.name: titleIds
optional_parameters.description: please follow this [link](https://rapidapi.com/rockapis-rockapis-default/api/rapid-linkedin-jobs-api/tutorials/how-to-find-a-title-id-on-linkedin%3F) to find title id by title

optional_parameters.name: onsiteRemote
optional_parameters.description:
it could be one of these;
- onSite
- remote
- hybrid

example: remote

optional_parameters.name: datePosted
optional_parameters.description: it could be one of these; anyTime, pastMonth, pastWeek, past24Hours

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: it could be one of these; mostRelevant, mostRecent

api_list.name: Search Jobs V2
api_list.description: Search LinkedIn jobs with keywords, company, location, on-site/remote, date posted, title, function, industry, salary, experience level, and job type filters.

it could be one of these; fullTime, partTime, contract, internship

optional_parameters.name: datePosted

optional_parameters.name: salary

optional_parameters.name: titleIds
